name: Holiday Wreath Class
description:
Red Cup Cafe
115 Broadway
Chesterton

Sunday, December 1st,  3pm

Learn the beginnings of wreath making using paddle wire, a wreath base, and evergreens to make your very own custom creation.  We will start with the basics, which are pine, cedar, fir, and holly.  You will add berries, succulents, glitter, pinecones, riboon, and feathers to glam up your wreath as little or as much as you like!  

Skip the game, make a wreath!!

name: Thanksgiving Center Piece  Time!
description:
Tuesday, November 26th
7pm
Red Cup Cafe
115 Broadway, Chesterton

Going to Grandma's house for Thanksgiving?  Don't know what to bring?
Flowers!

People coming over, and it's not enough that you raised, butchered, brined, and basted the turkey?  Need a little something extra?
Flowers!  

Is Thanksgiving Thursday just a teensy bit stressful?  
Flowers!

Join me for a Thanksgiving Centerpiece workshop where we will use the freshest fall flowers, pods, and berries to make a gorgeous arrangement you will be proud to give.  You will learn the basic structure of a low table piece, and then add your own touches, getting as wild as you want to be!  BYOB for a lovely night out with friends!  All materials will be provided. 

 Date & Time: November 26th, 7pm
 Location:  Red Cup Cafe, Chesterton

name: Swoon Over Ranunculus
description:
It's a known fact that women become weak in the knees over ranunculus.  Beautiful in a bouquet of mixed flowers, their loveliness shines when allowed to stand alone--just like the woman you love. 

Available in three different sizes, pictured in the smaller.  

When ordering please specify your preferred size:
Smaller - 20 stems
Big - 40 stems

Color will vary depending on availability.   

All prices include delivery.  Be sure to read my delivery info and when you check out please include the following in the comments section:

*Who the flowers are going to (name, address, phone number)
*What you would like to say on the card
*When you would like these delivered (Monday, Thursday, or Friday)

**Little imp not included**

name: Ranunculus in Vintage Glass
description:
Vintage States glasses in a riot of colors!  Pictured are 20 Ranunculus arranged in a Vintage 1940's-era States glass for the whole bouquet experience.  Ranunculus colors will be chosen depending on availability and how sweetly they match the glass.  

Vintage States available:

Alabama
Arkansas
Georgia
Idaho
Kentucky
Louisiana
Maryland
Michigan
Mississippi
Missouri
New Jersey
New Mexico
Ohio
South Dakota
Texas
Virginia
West Virginia

Specials:
Catalina Island, Avalon Bay
Cherokee Indian Reservation, N.C.
Great Smokey Mountains
Holland, Michigan
Jamestown, Virginia
Mackinac Island, Michigan
Renfro Valley, Kentucky
Williamsburg, Virginia

All prices include delivery.  Be sure to read the delivery info and when you check out please include the following in the comments section:

*Which Vintage glass you would like to send
*Who is the recipient (name, address, phone number)
*What you would like to say on the card
*When you would like these delivered (Monday, Thursday, or Friday)
